'''''Middle-earth: The Lidless Eye Companion''''' is a source-book for the [[Middle-earth Collectible Card Game]].

== From the publisher ==

This ''Companion'' includes the complete ''MELE'' rules (in larger print), a complete list of ''MELE cards'', scenarios for play, and several full-color NW Middle-earth maps.
